__e: One of these years, I'm going to beat him to the check.
I will pay the bill, sir, it just won't happen overnight.
I'll fetch it right now and I'll pay your check.
I'll pay you double the cash I gave you.
Because I am willing to payyou twice what he paid you to tell me the truth.
That's okay. I'll take care of that and double the rest.
If I promise him train fare home in case he don't make it, he'll come.
And I don't know how yet, but I will make this up to you.
That's it, Charles, only for a couple of days and I'll pay all the other tabs.
And I'm not paying your mother for it.
I hope you don't have a problem, but you have to understand that I am only paying one person for their time.
Or I'll pay someone else your money to do it for me.
What I want... is that someone takes care of him.
I don't have much, but I'll pay you what I can.
Just tell him I'll pay what he wants if I can find what I want.
What I want... is that someone takes care of him.
Just tell him I'll pay what he wants if I can find what I want.
I don't have much, but I'll pay you what I can.
Oh, uh, cash on the line, if that's okay.
Oh, no, I'll pay in cash for that too.
Come on. I'll pay you cash so we can just-- No!
All right, then, I'll pay you back tonight.
Better give him the money so he can go already.
I'll pay in a few months I want it that way.
I'm paying you for this extra work, too.
I'll pay you for the week's work, of course.
Look the other way and I'll pay you back for the rest of my life.
